source_sentence: 佛說盂蘭盆經
translation: Foshuo yulanpen jing

source_sentence: 西晉月氏三藏竺法護譯
translation: Translated by Zhu Fahou, the Tripiṭaka Master of the Yue family of the Western Jin Dynasty

source_sentence: 聞如是：一時佛在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 大目乾連始得六通，欲度父母，報乳哺之恩。
translation: When Mahāmaudgalyāyana first attained the six supernatural powers, he wanted to save his parents and repay the kindness of feeding them with milk.

source_sentence: 即以道眼觀視世間，見其亡母生餓鬼中，不見飲食，皮骨連立。
translation: He then observed the world with the eye of enlightenment and saw his deceased mother born in a hungry ghost, who didn't see food and drink or skin and bones standing there.

source_sentence: 目連悲哀，即鉢盛飯，往餉其母。
translation: With compassion, Maudgalyāyana filled his bowl with rice and went to feed his mother.

source_sentence: 母得鉢飯，便以左手障飯，右手摶飯。
translation: When his mother obtained the bowlful of rice, she used her left hand to obstruct the rice and cooked rice in her right hand.

source_sentence: 食未入口，化成火炭，遂不得食。
translation: Before he had eaten it, he transformed it into a charcoal and couldn't eat it.

source_sentence: 目連大叫，悲號啼泣，馳還白佛，具陳如此。
translation: Maudgalyāyana cried out in great distress, weeping and wailing. They rushed back to report this to the Buddha and told him exactly as he had said.

source_sentence: 佛言：「汝母罪根深結，非汝一人力所奈何！
translation: The Buddha said, Your mother's sinful faculty is deeply fettered, so why wouldn't you be able to do it alone?

source_sentence: 汝雖孝順，聲動天地，天神、地神、邪魔、外道、道士、四天王神亦不能奈何！
translation: Although you are filial and obedient, your voice shakes heaven and earth, and the gods, earth gods, demons, non-Buddhists, heretics, religious practitioners, and the four heavenly kings can't help!

source_sentence: 當須十方眾僧威神之力乃得解脫。
translation: You must rely on the authoritative power of the saṃgha in the ten directions to attain liberation.

source_sentence: 吾今當為汝說救濟之法，令一切難皆離憂苦，罪障消除。」
translation: Now, I will explain the method of salvation for you, so that all difficulties will be freed from sorrow and suffering and the hindrances of sin will be removed.

source_sentence: 佛告目連：「十方眾僧於七月十五日僧自恣時，當為七世父母及現在父母厄難中者，
translation: The Buddha told Maudgalyāyana, On the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when the saṃgha in the ten directions had performed their own confessional service, they would be among the seven worldly parents and present-day parents who were in distress.

source_sentence: 具飯、百味五果、汲灌盆器、香油錠爥、床敷臥具、盡世甘美以著盆中，
translation: They were provided with rice, a hundred flavors of five kinds of fruit, a pot for pouring water, an almsbowl filled with fragrant oil, a bed and bedding, and all worldly delicacies to put into the pot.

source_sentence: 供養十方大德眾僧。
translation: He made offerings to the great virtuous monks of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 當此之日，一切聖眾或在山間禪定、或得四道果、或樹下經行；
translation: On that day, all the holy ones might be meditating in the mountains, some attain the fruits of the four paths, or walk up and down under a tree.

source_sentence: 或六通自在、教化聲聞、緣覺；
translation: Or they may be self-contained in the six supernatural powers, teaching and edifying śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 或十地菩薩大人、權現比丘，在大眾中；
translation: Some of the great enlightening beings of the tenth stage were also present in the assembly.

source_sentence: 皆同一心，受鉢和羅飯。
translation: They all had the same mind and accepted the bowl of rice and porridge.

source_sentence: 具清淨戒聖眾之道，其德汪洋，其有供養此等自恣僧者，現在父母、七世父母、六種親屬得出三途之苦，
translation: They are endowed with the path of pure precepts and holy beings, their virtues vast and vast. Those who make offerings to these self-committed monks leave the suffering of the three paths at the hands of their present parents, seven kinds of worldly parents, and six kinds of relatives.

source_sentence: 應時解脫，衣食自然。
translation: He's liberated at the right time, and his clothing and food are natural.

source_sentence: 若復有人父母現在者，福樂百年；
translation: “Furthermore, if someone’s parents are present, they will have one hundred years of blessedness and happiness.

source_sentence: 若已亡七世父母，生天，自在化生，入天華光，受無量快樂。」
translation: If someone has lost their parents in seven worlds and is born in heaven, they'll be born freely transformed into a heavenly flower and experience measureless happiness.

source_sentence: 時佛勅十方眾僧，皆先為施主家呪願七世父母行禪定意，然後受食。
translation: The Buddha then commanded the saṃgha in the ten directions to first cast a spell for the donor's home and wish that seven generations of parents practice meditation before they would accept food.

source_sentence: 初受盆時，先安在佛塔前，眾僧呪願竟，便自受食。
translation: When he first accepted the pot, he placed it in front of the Buddha's stūpa, and when the saṃgha finished his spell and vows, he accepted food for himself.

source_sentence: 爾時目連比丘及此大會大菩薩眾皆大歡喜，而目連悲啼泣聲釋然除滅。
translation: At the time, the monk Maudgalyāyana and the great bodhisattvas in this assembly were all greatly delighted, but Maudgalyāyana cried out in pity and Śākyamuni's voice ceased.

source_sentence: 是時目連其母即於是日，得脫一劫餓鬼之苦。
translation: On that day, Maudgalyāyana's mother was freed from the suffering of a hungry ghost for an eon.

source_sentence: 爾時目連復白佛言：「弟子所生父母，得蒙三寶功德之力，眾僧威神之力故。
translation: It was then that Maudgalyāyana again said to the Buddha, The disciples' parents gave birth to them because they were blessed by the power of the merits of the Three Treasures and the authority of the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 若未來世一切佛弟子行孝順者，亦應奉此盂蘭盆，救度現在父母，乃至七世父母，
translation: If in the future all the Buddha’s disciples were to be obedient, they should also offer this basin of relics to rescue their present parents and so on, up to seven generations from now.

source_sentence: 為可爾不？」
translation: Is it possible?

source_sentence: 佛言：「大善快問！
translation: The Buddha said, Very good, quick question!

source_sentence: 我正欲說，汝今復問。
translation: I want to explain it, but now you may ask again.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有比丘比丘尼、國王太子、王子大臣宰相、三公百官、萬民庶人行孝慈者，
translation: Suppose there are monks, nuns, princes, princes, princes, ministers, chancellors, three emperors, one hundred officials, myriad people, and commoners who practice filial piety.

source_sentence: 皆應為所生現在父母、過去七世父母，於七月十五日——佛歡喜日、僧自恣日——以百味飲食安盂蘭盆中，
translation: On the fifteenth day of the seventh month - the Buddha's joyful day and the saṃgha's day of self-restraint - they should all place a hundred flavors of food and drink in a bowl or almsbowl for their present parents who were born and the parents of the past seven generations.

source_sentence: 施十方自恣僧。
translation: He gives it to the saṃgha of the ten directions for self-restraint.

source_sentence: 乞願便使現在父母壽命百年、無病，無一切苦惱之患，乃至七世父母離餓鬼苦，
translation: I pray that my present parents’ life span will be a hundred years in length, free from sickness, with no suffering or distress whatsoever. And so on, up to the point where my seventh generation of parents will be freed from the suffering of hungry ghosts.

source_sentence: 得生天人中，福樂無極。」
translation: They'll be born among gods and humans, with limitless merit and happiness.

source_sentence: 佛告諸善男子、善女人：「是佛弟子修孝順者，應念念中常憶父母，供養乃至七世父母。
translation: The Buddha told the good men and good women, This is a disciple of the Buddha who cultivates filial piety, remembering his parents in every moment of thought and making offerings to their parents for seven generations.

source_sentence: 年年七月十五日，常以孝順慈憶所生父母，乃至七世父母，為作盂蘭盆，
translation: On the fifteenth day of the seventh month in his old age, he always remembered his parents’ birthdays with filial piety and loving-kindness, even to the extent that he made a盆 for them.

source_sentence: 施佛及僧，以報父母長養、慈愛之恩。
translation: Giving to buddhas and saṃgha is a reward for the kindness of their parents' nurturing, compassion, and love.

source_sentence: 若一切佛弟子應當奉持是法。」
translation: If all the disciples of the Buddha should uphold this teaching, they'll observe it.

source_sentence: 爾時目連比丘、四輩弟子，聞佛所說，歡喜奉行。
translation: When the monks and four groups of disciples of Maudgalyāyana heard what the Buddha taught, they rejoiced and remembered it well.

source_sentence: 佛說盂蘭盆經
translation: Foshuo yulanpen jing
